dt.verbatim: stilts plot3d in=cat.xml xdata=RMAG ydata=BMAG zdata=VEL zlog=true

dd.p: Plots a 3-d scatter plot of red magnitude vs. blue magnitude vs. velocity; the velocity is plotted on a logarithmic scale. Since no omode or out value has been specified, the plot is posted directly to the graphics display for inspection. By adding the parameter out=xyplot.eps the plot could be written to an Encapsulated Postscript file instead.
